2586.name: MAIL_ADDRESS_DOMAIN_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED
2586.message:

you entered may be incorrect.

2586.short_description: The email address entered uses a domain which could not be located.
2586.long_description: The email address entered uses a domain which could not be located.
